other_tests.findings: WBC count of 331 cells/mL (76% lymphocytes), protein level of 119 mg/dL, and normal glucose level.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Two weeks later, a lumbar puncture revealed WBC count of 127 cells/mL (87% lymphocytes), RBC count of 3355 cells/mL, protein level of 92 mg/dL, and glucose level of 36 mg/dL.

other_tests.findings: Bifrontal epileptiform discharges and an evolving run of stimulus-induced seizures.
Increase in glucose level to 47 mg/dL, decrease in pleocytosis (WBC count, 6 cells/mL), and decrease in HHV-6 load to 4400 copies/mL by PCR.
